msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso is blank
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: This light-brown papyrus is regularly cut at all sides. 1 kollesisin the middle. A large piece of the top of the sheet on the left was cut off, probably before the sheet were pasted together.Some damage to the papyrus along some of the vertical folds. (TC)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the tax payer. (TC)

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt
origin.persName: Horos, son of Satabous, grandson of Horos, mother Theonis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 250)
Satabous, son of Petheus, grandson of Satabous, mother Tapetaus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 226)
Onnophris, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 192)
Achillas, son of Ptollis, grandson of Hieranouphos, mother Thermouthis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 158)
Petoraipis, son of Hatres, grandson of Imouthes, mother Soeris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 212)
Onnophris, son of Menches, grandson of Onnophris, mother Thaseis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 191)
Onnophris, son of Sisois, grandson of Petsiris, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 192)
Horion, son of Petheus, grandson of Esouris, mother Komonis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 249)
Psenesis, son of Petheus, grandson of Esouris, mother Komonis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 248)
Heron, son of Petesouchos, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Tasoucharion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 171)
Chairemon, son of Areios, grandson of Satabous, mother Tapetaus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 247)
Anoubas, son of Horos, grandson of Anoubas, mother Tepheros (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 151)
Herakles, son of Sokrates, grandson of Phasis, mother Tapetheus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 168)
Petheus, son of Petaus, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Segathis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 203)
Ptolemaios, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, mother Tanesneus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 218)
Chairemon, son of Heron, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Didyme (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 247)
Acheillas, son of Heron, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Didyme (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 158)
Limnaios, son of Onnophris, grandson of Satabous, mother Ptolema (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 185)
Apynchis, son of Pnepherotos, grandson of Pakysis, mother Tasoucharion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 154)
Chairemon, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Pasoxis, mother Tanephremis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 247)
Pakysis, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Pakysis, mother Tepheros (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 196)
Ptolemaios, son of Petheus, grandson of Sokmenis, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 219)

provenance.p: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.

keywords.term: see electronic version of P.Mich. IV, 224

div.ab: "Column 5:;The19 of the same (month);;Horos, son of Satabous, grandson of Horos, mother Theonis, 16 drachmas;;Satabous, son of Petheus, grandson of Satabous, mother Tapetaus, 4 drachmas;;Onnophris, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Thaesis, 4 drachmas;;Achillas, son of Ptollis, grandson of Hieranouphos, mother Thermouthis, 8 drachmas;;Petoraipis, son of Hatres, grandson of Imouthes, mother Soeris, 4 drachmas;;Onnophris, son of Menches, grandson of Onnophris, mother Thaseis, 8 drachmas;;Onnophris, son of Sisois, grandson of Petsiris, mother Thaesis, 4 drachmas;;Horion, son of Petheus, grandson of Esouris, mother Komonis, 4 drachmas;;Psenesis, son of Petheus, grandson of Esouris, mother Komonis, 4 drachmas;;Heron, son of Petesouchos, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Tasoucharion, 16 drachmas;;The12th year: Chairemon, son of Areios, grandson of Satabous, mother Tapetaus, 20 drachmas;;Anoubas, son of Horos, grandson of Anoubas, mother Tepheros, 28 obols;;Herakles, son of Sokrates, grandson of Phasis, mother Tapetheus, 12 drachmas;;Petheus, son of Petaus, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Segathis, 4 drachmas, 28 obols;;Ptolemaios, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, mother Tanesneus, 4 drachmas;;The 12th year, the remainder is the administrator fee; ;Chairemon, son of Heron, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Didyme, 4 drachmas;;Acheillas, brother, with the same mother, 4 drachmas;;Limnaios, son of Onnophris, grandson of Satabous, mother Ptolema, 8 drachmas;;Apynchis, son of Pnepherotos, grandson of Pakysis, mother Tasoucharion, 4 drachmas;;Chairemon, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Pasoxis, mother Tanephremis, 4 drachmas;;Pakysis, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Pakysis, mother Tepheros, 4 drachmas, 8 obols;;Ptolemaios, son of Petheus, grandson of Sokmenis, mother Thaesis, 8 drachmas;;intotal for the day, drachmas 160, 17 obols, of which for the 12th year 24 drachmas, 11 obols."
